title: Director of Core Compliance Programs
description:
Binance is the leading global blockchain ecosystem and cryptocurrency infrastructure provider whose suite of financial products includes the world’s largest digital-asset exchange. Our mission is to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.If you’re looking for a fast-paced, mission-driven organization where opportunities to learn and excel are endless, then Binance is the place for you.

Responsibilities:

    • Help Binance handle complex global challenges by providing executive level leadership and problem-solving abilities
    • Identify chances to support and carry out business objectives by working together with executive leadership across the entire organization
    • Mentor, develop, and provide leadership to a team of Compliance professionals across multiple disciplines including : Monitoring & Testing,  Policy & Program, 3rd party Due Diligence, M&A Diligence, Corporate Training, Compliance Risk Management & Enterprise Wide Risk Assessments (EWRA)
    • Develop a Compliance Risk Management Program to cover the current and contemplated products, services, and subsidiaries working with Compliance Officers and executives globally and carry out the EWRA
    • Enhance the Monitoring & Testing program to test the effectiveness of the Compliance Program and its key controls 
    • Timely communicate findings and recommendations to management and stakeholders, both at periodic intervals and as needed regarding escalated or high-risk compliance issues, in order to accomplish compliance goals
    • Overseeing the drafting and ongoing maintenance of robust policies and procedures
    • Enhance our exam and audit management program to ensure consistency in communication with all stakeholders globally

Requirements

    • Prior experience as a Head of Compliance/Compliance Officer, MLRO, or similar role
    • Significant experience in a previous regulatory or compliance managerial position at a fintech company or global financial institution
    • Skilled in collaborating with stakeholders at all levels
    • Experience and/or passion for crypto preferred
Working at Binance• Be a part of the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem that continues to grow and offers excellent career development opportunities.• Work alongside diverse, world-class talent in an environment where learning and growth opportunities are endless.• Tackle fast-paced, challenging and unique projects.• Work in a truly global organization, with international teams and a flat organizational structure.• Competitive salary and benefits.• Balance life and work with flexible working hours and casual work attire.Learn more about how Binancians embody the organization’s core values, creating a unified culture that enables collaboration, excellence, and growth.
